front.Z3Instance module¶

Created on Apr 30, 2013

@author: ezulkosk

class front.Z3Instance.Z3Instance(module)[source]¶

Bases: object

Stores and instantiates all necessary constraints for the ClaferZ3 model.

Used to map constraints in the UNSAT core to Boolean variables. Will eventually be used to map UNSAT core back to the Clafer model.

Parameters:module (Module) – The Clafer AST

Converts Clafer constraints to Z3 constraints and computes models.

setOptions()[source]¶

Sets basic options for the Z3 solver. Adds additional options for better pretty-printing, if debugging.

unsat_map = None¶

Create simple functions and constraints, that may be used in many places.
